info.name: Trustfall's Gen9 Showdown Skin (Read Description)
info.description:
***Watch this video to know how to enable the intended font, it is not enabled by default****
https://youtu.be/MYrxsSEgBhA?t=439

Support further updates and development to this project:
partreon.com/PSskins
info.additionalInfo:
Join Discord to talk to me directly, report bugs, and ask for help.
Link to Discord: https://discord.gg/XVkJg4bYqG

Changelog: 1.4:
-Mouse hover hitboxes on active pokemon are now better aligned in doubles.
-Weather no longer overlays pokemon party sprites. 
-Recharged button fixed (ex. Hyper Beam)
-Rain Weather tweaked
-Sand Weather got a complete overhaul. 


Changelog: 1.3:
- Player 1â€™s Trainer was moved below the pokemon by popular vote (83% majority).  
- Wonder Room and Magic Room no longer cover everything up. 
- Mist and Safeguard alignment fixed. 
- Fixed white backgrounds for some pop-out tool-tips, they should now match.




Changelog: 1.2:
- Trainers are no longer see through
- Fixed Gen 9  sprites being small and offcentered
- Tweaked Pokemon placement to better align with move animations
- Increased the size of the labels that appear above the pokemon when attacked. 

Changelog: 1.1:
- Added BW sprite support by...
- Backgrounds now appear
- Stat bars are now properly placed.
(some of the sprite placements are still wonky do to how showdown centers sprites)

Changelog: 1.0:
- New Attack Buttons
- New Stat Bars
- Animated Backgrounds
-Animated Weather
- Animated Terrains
-Animated Trick Room/ Gravity
- HD Layout 
- Brand new bottom bar
- Much more!
